segments.text: I can’t believe how absorbed the woman is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost like she’s in a trance, completely unaware of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sudden rush of anger; how could she not notice?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are getting bolder, sneaking cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks so determined, balancing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races as I battle with the urge to yell at him to get down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl—her hopeful expression breaks my heart a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s innocence there, yet they’re engaged in such mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself both amused and appalled at their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mix of emotions this scene brings up in me!
segments.speaker: PAR
